member.value: true if the button is checked; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ClientEnabled

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the button is enabled on the client.

member.value: true if the button is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ClientSideEvents

summary.para: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the ButtonSettings.

member.value: A object which allows assigning handlers to the client-side events available to the ButtonSettings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ClientVisible

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies the initial visibility state of a Button on the client.

member.value: true to make a Button initially displayed; false to render it into the web page, but make it initially hidden on the client.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.CustomJSProperties

summary.para: Enables you to supply any server data that can then be parsed on the client.

member.value: A CustomJSPropertiesEventHandler method to which custom processing is delegated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.EnableClientSideAPI

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the extension to which this ButtonSettings object is passed can be manipulated on the client side via code.

member.value: true if an extension's client object model is fully available; false if no programmatic interface is available for the extension on the client side.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.GroupName

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the group to which the button belongs.

member.value: A string value specifying the name of the group to which the button belongs.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ImagePosition

summary.para: Gets or sets the image position within the button.

member.value: A enumeration value that specifies the image position within the button.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.Images

summary.para: Provides access to the settings that define images for various elements within the Button.

member.value: A ButtonImages object that contains image settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.RightToLeft

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not an extension to which these settings are passed supports right-to-left representation.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.RouteValues

summary.para: Defines the routing logic by specifying the names of a Controller and an Action which should handle clicks on a Button.

member.value: An object containing the Controller and Action names.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.Styles

summary.para: Provides access to the style settings that control the appearance of the extension's visual elements.

member.value: A object that provides style settings for view elements.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.Text

summary.para: Gets or sets the text displayed within the button.

member.value: A string value representing the text displayed within the button.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.UseSubmitBehavior

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button uses the client browser's submit mechanism or the ASP.NET postback mechanism.

member.value: true if the button uses the client browser's submit mechanism; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ValidateInvisibleEditors

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether invisible editors should be validated together with visible ones.

member.value: true to validate both visible and invisible editors; false to validate only visible editors.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ValidationContainerID

summary.para: Gets or sets the ID of the naming container for those editors for which the button causes validation.

member.value: A string value that specifies the naming container's ID.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Web.Mvc.ButtonSettings.ValidationGroup

summary.para: Gets or sets the group of inputs that are validated when the button is clicked.

member.value: A string value that specifies the group of inputs that are validated when the button is clicked.
